text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This year's summer training camp<n>has gone by in a flash. I
can't believe<n>today is our last day.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Akebono has taken every<n>exercise I throw her in
stride—and with<n>a huge smile on her face. Perhaps I<n>can
reward her with a delicious meal!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Another great day of training! This<n>camp sure has been fun.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
So, what would you like for dinner?! I<n>know the lodges have
food for us, but<n>since this is our last day, I thought—

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Wh-what?! What's wrong?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: The thing... Is it something for work?<n>Do you need help?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
You were so helpful throughout the<n>whooole camp, so I
really think you<n>should rest...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Oooh! Ahaha, I see, I see.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Well, I'm a little sad we can't eat<n>together, but that's okay!
I'll see you<n>laterrr! ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
...Looks like my smooth-talking<n>managed to convince her. I
don't have<n>a lot of time, so I'm off to start<n>prepping our
meal.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
First things first, I need ingredients... I<n>call out to a few
students to see if<n>they have any recommendations for<n>
shops, but their reaction isn't what I<n>expected.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
You're treating Bono to a meal? Then<n>we wanna help too!
You're not the<n>only one she cooks for, you know!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
I know a good fishmonger! They<n>were selling lots of
delicious fish<n>earlier!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume C
text_block_list.text:
There's a good vegetable stand<n>around here too, so I'll go
there. As<n>for the meat... can you handle it?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume D
text_block_list.text:
Okay! I bet if we asked around, we<n>could get more people
involved. I'll go<n>talk to everyone!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before I know it, the number of cooks<n>in the kitchen has
increased<n>drastically. We divvy up the work and<n>get to it.
Two hours later...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Oh, wow, wow, WOOOOOW!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Where did this feast come from?!<n>Skewers, yakisoba, and
pan-fried fish<n>too! ...Ah, there's even chanko!
choice_data_list: We made this all for you.
We made this all for you.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Huh? For... me?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Well, it was originally your trainer's<n>idea, but we wanted to
thank you too,<n>so we joined in.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Thank you so much for always<n>cooking such good food!
Seriously,<n>this has been a long time coming.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume C
text_block_list.text:
Eating your cooking always fills me<n>with energy. It's like
I'm recharged<n>and ready to take on the next day of<n>
training.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume D
text_block_list.text:
You always work so hard to make us<n>happy, but we want to
make you<n>happy too...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Aww, you guys...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Well, consider your plan a success!<n>I'm so happy—and
hungry! Can I dig<n>in?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, of course!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: But before that... Ready? Go!

text_block_list.name: All
text_block_list.text: Thanks for the food!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The night air mingles with the scent of<n>our feast and our
laughter. But one<n>student's smile is the biggest of all...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: BUONO! This dish, that dish! They're<n>all super-duper buono!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, everyone! Thank you,<n>Trainer! Eating tasty food
made for<n>you really does fill you with joy!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And that's Hishi Akebono's.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After the party, we clean up and<n>students gradually make
their way<n>back to the lodge.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Ahhh... ☆ I'm sooo full! Thank you<n>again for today!
choice_data_list: Did we do enough to thank you?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Of course you did! I couldn't be<n>happier!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
And you know what? I think I get it<n>now... I know what that
sumo wrestler<n>meant about the feelings of the<n>people
eating!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
We said "thanks for the food" before<n>eating, right? I think
that little phrase is<n>the finishing touch on every dish.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
"Thank you" and "I'm so happy." A<n>meal wouldn't be
complete without<n>those words sprinkled in beforehand.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Just like ingredients, you need lots<n>and lots of feelings to
make a chanko!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Up till now, I've been focusing solely<n>on making other
people happy with<n>my cooking...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
And while I certainly noticed<n>everyone's gratitude towards
me, I<n>don't think I gave it the credit it<n>deserves.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
From now on, when people thank me,<n>I'll listen. I have to
realize those<n>words are a sign that I'm offering<n>them a
truly satisfying meal.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: If I do that, maybe they'll even giveme a thank-you at the end of themeal too.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Ehehe... Hey, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
I've always wanted to be a pot of<n>chanko and bring smiles
to<n>everyone's faces... But...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Now, I hope my food makes thepeople eating want to spread thatsmile to someone else. Only then canI be a true chanko.
choice_data_list: I think you're already doing that.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Am I? ...I see. So that's how you see<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Ehehe... Sounds like you're the dashi<n>stock to my hot pot!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: The dashi stock! The very foundation<n>of any hot pot!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: In other words, I can't be a pot of<n>chanko without you!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Akebono certainly has a unique<n>way of expressing it,
but I can tell<n>from her smile that she trusts me with<n>all her
heart.
